		consequat.",link:"https://github.com/fmartinez32/Youtube_Content_NLP"}];const ProjectList=projects.map(projects=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project_object_container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project_object",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project_title",children:projects.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project_description",children:projects.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{width:'100%',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'flex-start'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IconButton,{className:"project_link",component:Link,href:projects.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",sx:{color:'var(--primary-color)',padding:'0',transition:'0.2s','&:hover':{color:'var(--accent-color-gh)',transform:'scale(1.1)'}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GitHubIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",sx:{ml:1},children:" GitHub"})]})})]})});});const Projects=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects_title",children:"./projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects_list",children:ProjectList})]});};export default Projects;
